original_text: Imnah's son Kore, a Levite, was the guard who watched the East Gate of the temple. He received the gifts that people offered to the Lord. He had authority to share among the priests and the Levites the gifts that people brought and the holy things.
korean_text: 동문지기 레위 사람 임나의 아들 고레는 즐거이 하나님께 드리는 예물을 맡아 여호와께 드리는 것과 모든 지성물을 나눠 주며

sentences.original_text: Imnah's son Kore, a Levite, was the guard
sentences.korean_translation: 임나의 아들 고레는 레위인이었고, 그는 파수꾼이었다

sentences.original_text: who watched the East Gate of the temple
that people offered to the Lord
among the priests and the Levites
